images.alt: Daniel Murray working at a painting sitting on an easel
Close up of a hand holding a paint brush working on a portrait
Daniel Murray painting at an easel at the Portrait Artist of the Year event

statement:
I enjoy painting realistic portrayals of the human form and mixing that with abstracted landscapes inspired by the highland environment I grew up in.

Using scale, contrast and composition, I create atmospheric worlds in which the subjects of the paintings inhabit. Striking, slightly unsettling, jagged, unworldly backdrops that accentuate the fragility of the human condition represented by the figures. My paintings are inspired by my own life experiences.
